name: HARP Vefa
description:
In 1915, before the Dardanelles War,
The heroic story of two soldiers who served in the Ottoman Empire.

story

Abdullah and Mehmet are two experienced soldiers who served in the Ottoman Empire.
They fall captive in a battle they've been fighting. They are obliged to continue their lives in the country where they are taken prisoner by depriving them of their freedom. They accept the situation and continue their lives.

Problems encountered while pursuing their objectives are reflected in their experiences of war, intelligence and skill
They will have to confront their fears when they solve it.

Game
Despite the fact that our game is a 'FPS' game, Puzzles, a lot of problems to solve, extraordinary environments that will force your imagination and test your attention.
